s: Alice Cooper is an American rock band that formed in Phoenix, Arizona, in 1964. The original lineup consisted of lead singer Vince Furnier (later known as Alice Cooper), Glen Buxton (guitar), Michael Bruce (guitar), Dennis Dunaway (bass), and Neal Smith (drums).
